import React, { useState } from 'react'; // Main App component that contains the entire application export default function App() { const [page, setPage] = useState('home'); const renderPage = () => { switch (page) { case 'home': return (

Ultimate File Converter & Compressor

Effortlessly reduce file size with our PDF compressor and convert documents between all major formats. Our powerful tools make managing your digital documents simple and efficient.

); case 'services': return (

Our Services

{/* Service Card: Compress PDF */}

Compress PDF

Reduce the file size of your PDFs for easier sharing.

{/* Service Card: Compress Image */}

Compress Image

Optimize image files to save space without losing quality.

{/* Service Card: Word to Excel */}

Word to Excel

Convert data from a Word document to an Excel spreadsheet.

{/* Service Card: Excel to Word */}

Excel to Word

Easily convert your Excel sheets into a Word document.

{/* Service Card: PDF to Word */}

PDF to Word

Convert PDF documents into editable Word files with high fidelity.

{/* Service Card: PDF Editor */}

PDF Editor

Edit, annotate, and manage your PDFs directly in your browser.

); case 'compress-pdf': return (

PDF Compression Tool

Drag & Drop to Compress

Drag your PDF file here to compress it, or click to select a file.

); default: return null; } }; return (
